'''Clear Waters''' is [[Traveler (Hydro)]]'s [[4th Ascension Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* To gain the maximum DMG Bonus for the Torrent Surge at the skill's end, the HP needed to be consumed via Suffusion is:
** <math>5000 / .45 \approx</math> '''11,111.11111''' 
** or rounded up to '''11,112'''
